website_summaries.verdict: This full-face mask is a high-quality version of an iconic science fiction character. Some modifications may improve comfort, but it is definitely convincing.
pros: Affordable alternative to expensive Darth Vader helmets
Two-piece helmet, not just a mask
cons: Interior of mask has sharp edges
Difficult to wear for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Made Me More Attractive. Single Men Should Wear It To Bars to Find Girlfriends.
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing.! I wore it to a wedding (seriously). Changed my dating life forever... Women have never been more attracted to me. This is really a miracle product! Before, people just saw me as a vaguely geeky Star Wars nerd... just another face in the crowd. Now I'm master of the galaxy! (The quality was also much better than expected... good use of Republic Credits.) The only downside of it is I know have the awkward job of somehow breaking the news to these women that I lied and am not, in fact, the real Darth Vader. Or just maintaining the charade forever. Either way I'm in a tough spot.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: ... a really flimsy thin plastic but this is hard good quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a really flimsy thin plastic but this is hard good quality stuff. It can be made a little larger or smaller by changing where the two pieces are attached with velcro. Like others have said, the eyes are a little hard to see out of because of the distortion, but nothing that will keep you from walking around. I am really pleased with this purchase and would recommend it to anyone wanting a good quality Vader mask.
customer_reviews.author: P. Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask! Well made and fit well! My husband has a large head and this fit him comfortably :) The only complaint was that he couldn't breath that well while wearing it and it got hot quickly...Otherwise a great product and sturdy! Looked amazing with his Darth Vader cosplay!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ErikaTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: It's actually awesome. Not sure what the super expensive Vader Mask ...
customer_reviews.text: It's actually awesome. Not sure what the super expensive Vader Mask has that this one doesn't (other than the mesh mouth) but this thing looks pretty real and was comfortable to wear. I would caution that the neck is a little long, so if your short necked, it my dig into your chest a bit. It also has eye pieces that are glued in, which fell out a couple of times, so treat this mask gently if you want it to last ...
customer_reviews.author: CoDy ChoPs

customer_reviews.title: Have realistic expectations.
customer_reviews.text: You're not going to join the 501st Legion with this helmet, but if you're looking at this you might not even know what that is. The eye lenses are very hard to see out of as reviewed before me. However, I'm not unhappy with the purchase. I don't need a $700 movie prop. I just wanted a decent looking helmet for some fun pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Justalittlelady

customer_reviews.title: Lenses Distorted
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t be writing a review except I believe this product has a safety flaw. The lenses for the eyes are not smooth creating a viewing window that has distortions. Looking through the lenses, you kinda feel like a fly looking through a hundred little windows and trying to put the real picture together. I cannot wear it for any length of time without getting a headache. You decide what you’re willing to do with it on... I’ll sit on a couch or walk around an area I know very well... that’s about it.
customer_reviews.author: Will M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Basic but fits the need.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with noticeable scratches on it considering it was in it proper box suggesting it was a return. Eye lenses appear to have been made by a blind person as seeing out of them will give anyone a headache in minutes. They are super horrible quality and warped as others have said. Overall though it was a dirt cheap vader mask. Not at all accurate if thats what your looking for. For price and quality it fits the description.
customer_reviews.author: SomeguyfromWisco

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This Darth Vader helmet is pretty cool ngl, the size of it a bit bigger for me but that’s expected since you buy a full head darth vader helmet that’s around 40-35$, you want it to fit on as many people as possible, The thing I don’t really like about this helmet it’s the goggles, you can actually see through them from the outside of the mask so it kinda ruins the immersion of the helmet, you can always buy some lenses and replace the original ones with them and that can solve this issue. But overall and for the price, i’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: larping as a sophisticated person

customer_reviews.title: Ok cheap helmet but problematic to actually wear.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok product for about the $20 price point. It's cheaply made but actually looks much better than the picture would have you think. The dome can sit lower than pictured so you don't get the black manta bug eye effect as shown, but it's velcro so it doesn't sit very securely. Unfortunately it is impossible to wear for any lengthy period of time as the cheap lenses distort your vision and get fogged up very quickly. While wearing it for Halloween I could barely see a thing and had to take many breaks from it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Right

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Mask - Too Big For Younger Kids
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for his 13th birthday more than anything. When the package arrived and I opened it, I was pleasantly surprised at how good the mask looked - the pictures don't do it justice. And when my son opened it, he could not have been more happy. Just be aware that because it's made for adults it is a bit large - it would not work well for younger kids. The bottom of the mask sits on my son's collar bones and gets to be a bit uncomfortable after a while.
customer_reviews.author: J. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Lenses are garbage, looks good on the shelf
customer_reviews.text: For the price the mask looks great, but as far as wearing it for any extended period of time, good luck. The lenses in the mask are super wavy. You can see but, not well. Trying to walk around is a little disorienting. Also the ventilation is not great, definitely get that Vader heavy breathing. And there is zero padding in the helmet. Looks great on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Beer+Friends= Darth Vader Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Ill be honest this was a drunk purchase.. I had 2 friends in the bar say "you wont buy a Darth Vader helmet!" (dont ask how this started because i have no idea) So now here i am, a proud owner of a vader helmet and i have to say it was a good drunk idea. Velcro inside makes it so you can adjust it. just so you know

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet with some modifications.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome helmet made of hard plastic. Except that it doesn’t ventilate well. After wearing it for 30-60 mins the eye pieces fog up and condensation builds up in the helmet. It make it uncomfortable to wear. Also the lens is poor quality and distorts your vision. Hard to trick or treat in or watch young ones trick or treat in. So I made some modifications. I replaced the lenses with window screen mesh. This helps it ventilate much better. Also added some pads inside the helmet to make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: httrg3

customer_reviews.title: we laughed at him all night because the helmet mad him look like he had a tiny little head
customer_reviews.text: this says it is for adults, but it's really made for children and small adults. I bought this for my son who is 6'5" and weighs 320 lbs. Because it is two pieces he was able to were it with his darth vader costume, but it was not proportional with the rest of his body, we laughed at him all night because the helmet mad him look like he had a tiny little head...it was pretty funny. So if you are and average or large size adult, this helmet will probably be too small. but....it is made of good quality hard plastic, it's not one of those cheap flimsy masks.
customer_reviews.author: S. Parlogean

customer_reviews.title: Good wow factor but not practical
customer_reviews.text: This helmet looks great. The two pieces velcro together which can be a little clumsy. It sticks well but putting it on and keeping it all straight is not automatic. My biggest complaint are the eyes. The plastic is curved and distorting. You can see enough to walk but there is no way you could read anything.
customer_reviews.author: Goober

customer_reviews.title: Just like the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old was so excited for this helmet for his costume. It is sturdy and we are all impressed with quality. The fit was perfect for him and my 4- year- old wore it for fun, too, although it was a little big on him. He's the storm trooper in the photo. ^_^ My son did comment it gets very warm inside and he couldn't wear it for very long. Vision was also limited since the viewpoint is in front. He also couldn't hear well in it, either, but those are expected since it's an enclosed helmet. Overall, very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vader Mask!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mask. Very realistic and will be a valuable part of my Vader Halloween costume. It’s very durable plastic and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Haakon

customer_reviews.title: looks great, but
customer_reviews.text: The mask looks great and it fits well. It is made of fairly substantial plastic and is not the flimsy stuff you often see. The only drawback is that the eyes fog up almost immediately when you wear it. There really isn't any way to prevent this because the ventilation around the mouth is minimal. I tried to wear it on Halloween and almost killed myself tripping over stuff because I couldn't see. As a display for a movie fan it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: I find your lack of full head helmet disturbing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet. Received a lot of compliments on it. It fit over my rather large head, with glasses on. It is a full head helmet, adding that much more realism to the Vader costume. It's plastic, so it's a little stuffy, but that means that just breathing normally results in the Darth Vader breathing sound effect, no additional purchase required! View through the lenses is highly distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Pete T.

customer_reviews.title: this helmet fits my melon head fairly well
customer_reviews.text: I have a very large head, (one size fits most....HA) but this helmet fits my melon head fairly well. only drawback is i need glasses, and the mask does not allow enough space for them to fit. I'm alergic to contacts, so i just have to be half blind while wearing it. for the price, i don't expect them to do this, but do yourself a favor, and add some foam weatherstrip under the eyes. it's a touch sharp there, and it will keep your muggy breath from steaming the lenses
customer_reviews.author: Justin Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great mask!
customer_reviews.text: Been keeping an eye on these for this year's Halloween.. Didn't want to pay $100 and was excited to see this one at 30. The other reviews/pics made me take a chance and definitely NOT disappointed! The mask looks great! The only downside is that the lenses aren't easy to see through like sun glasses...they've got a bit of distortion. I'm kinda curious if they can be replaced with sunglass lenses...will have to look into that later.
customer_reviews.author: bjjjcr

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected. I have a smaller dome so I've got plenty of room in this. Personally, I don't know how Anakin could ever see out of this thing! LOL. One word of caution though... I left it in my hot car for three days and the Velcro tape on the inside that holds it together came off. Don't leave it in a hot car! My mistake. Already fixed though.
customer_reviews.author: G. K. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be more perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Darth Vader helmet for Halloween and went to parties and received so many compliments on it. It literally made the costume pop ! The costume I bought only had a mask with a strap in the back. I knew I had to have the helmet to complete the ensemble. And now, not only will I be able to wear it for comic cons, but I use the helmet as a keepsake in my living room that makes a great conversation piece. It couldn't be more perfect😝 May the force be with you !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this helmet! It is pretty well put together for the price. I bought it for myself and I will say I have a pretty normal size head wearing a med-lg hat and when it is on it is a snug fit. People with Larger heads would find it too tight. I would have preferred the eye lenses to be made a little better as they are a somewhat smoggy, like looking through some dirty glasses and it would have been nice to put some foam around them for comfort. Over all it is a great deal for the price as I plan on making mods to it for myself. May the force be with you!
customer_reviews.author: flutterfly74

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!!
customer_reviews.text: My head is really big... I mean REALLY big... And it fits perfect... Quality es great... This is a two part helmet... Like front and rear from the top... If you want an idea on how it is, just watch episode 3, the part when mask is being adapted to Anakin's head. It stay together with velcro.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love my new Vader helmet, 10/10
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up half expecting it to be lame or not as described.. but was pleasantly surprised at the detail and craftmanship for the money. I love my new vader helmet and am excited to start wearing it out in the world as i go about my daily routine.. honestly the fact that you can wear a mask literally EVERYWHERE now and the social distancing thing are the only good things to come from this covid crap.
customer_reviews.author: eric w.

customer_reviews.title: Would be perfect if they changed the plastic in the eye holes
customer_reviews.text: We were really happy with how this mask fits and looks. The three stars is because the plastic material over the eye holes is not easy to see thru. It’s actually kind of wavy and hard to see thru if at all.
customer_reviews.author: AWVA

customer_reviews.title: Used Item
customer_reviews.text: the actual mask is pretty cool. however, it arrived used and covered in a thick coat of dust. there were sliding finger prints all over the mask- in side, and outside of the packaging. aaand, last but not least, dog food. yes people, there was dog food inside the packaging. again. very cool mask. its just for a prop in my rec room. i just wouldn't buy it again - not from rubies costumes on amazon, anyway.
customer_reviews.author: bejenerous

customer_reviews.title: Star Wars Rule!!
customer_reviews.text: This was fine from what I can remember. Apparently it looks bad to leave a short review ... which in my mind is quite deceitful. But I refuse to leave a fake review so I am adding all these words to make it a longer review. Well at least everyone knows that I leave honest reviews. LOL This was bought for my family's halloween costume and they didn't return it so it was fine. Sorry for the crappy review but it's all I can remember.
customer_reviews.author: AromaHippy Chick

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the real thing
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Halloween a few years back. I have a pretty big head but this helmet fit comfortably. The face mask attaches to the helmet part with Velcro that does a good job of holding it. Never felt loose or in danger of falling off. The one thing is that the lenses for the eyes are a little foggier than sunglasses, so it's fine for walking around but I wouldn't expect to drive, bike, or tightrope walk in this.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good value for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that it arrived quickly. Made sturdy and its a two piece Velcro set. You might have to add Velcro or a chin strap to make sure it fits your head snug enough when you look left of right. I have a authentic replica Darth Vader helmet and this one is much easier to see out of than that one. Overall I'm pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Msimms

customer_reviews.title: It looks good, the Velcro that attaches each piece to each ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, the Velcro that attaches each piece to each other comes undone because it is taped to each piece. It is easy to put back together or fix long term if you wanted to...I should also say, that I bought this for my four year old and I was able to make it fit him by trimming the lower neck portion off a bit with a pair of scissors...It was hard to find a kids size
customer_reviews.author: DJbred18

customer_reviews.title: My 7-year-old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old went through the Darth Vader phase. I purchased this for him. It was a little big on him but he swears it was perfect. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ep

customer_reviews.title: Good mask
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome Darth Vader mask. It is two pieces that velcro together - the top/back and the face piece. The fit can be somewhat adjusted by how the pieces are put together. Looks very realistic. Keep in mind this is a $30 mask. There is no padding inside. If you plan on wearing this for long periods, plan to add padding - won't take much to make this more comfortable. The lenses are pretty bad and distort your view, but again, no complaints for the cost. I didn't really expect high quality optics, and you can see good enough to be Darth Vader.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Wraps all the way around the head
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year-old was adamant that his Darth Vader helmet needed to wrap all the way around his head for Halloween. This definitely made him look like his head was huge when he had it on (which was kind of cute, actually), but it fit his head on the inside just fine. It was good quality for the price. If you're an adult fanatic who's looking for a super high-end helmet, this is probably not for you. If you're looking for a Halloween costume that looks a notch above the normal Vader mask that just goes in front of their face, this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Peeshka

customer_reviews.title: Luke I’m not your father
customer_reviews.text: This thing seems great, but it’s almost unwearable. I got it to wear out with my daughter and I was soaked with condensation from my breath. It isn’t well ventilated so I could pour the water out of it. The eyes look like those drunk goggles. You can push them out but that’s not what you should have to do with something like this.
customer_reviews.author: wareagle2334

customer_reviews.title: Blurry vision but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear at my son’s birthday party. He loved its. Decent quality. Although you can’t see through the lenses clearly. Everything is blurry. Other then that it’s pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this product 5 stars as it is THAT Awesome! However there is one caveat: night visibility. This was for a child's Halloween costume to be used in trick or treating. The eyes are very dark. Our kid continously pulled the helmet off so they could see. It became an issue and eventually the helmet was pulled off completely. We still kept it and love it, just wish we'd known this tidbit prior.
customer_reviews.author: totallyweezul

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as a cake decoration. I wanted the full wrap around helmet and this was perfect. In addition, it fit all of the adults at the party who wanted to try it on. It will now become part of our Halloween costume chest.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Darth Vader On A Budget
customer_reviews.text: So impressed by the quality and price of this Darth Vader helmet/faceplate replica. Photos really don't do the item justice. It's slightly hard to breathe while wearing, so I wouldn't recommend donning to for a long period of time, but for short Vader fantasy getaways, it's a fun ride.
customer_reviews.author: Will Stape

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I was putting together my own Darth Vader costume for Halloween because I refused to buy anything that only had a half mask for the costume. This thing is amazing and really looks great, the two piece design allows a multitude of head sizes fit easily, but I did have to do some modifications to make a better fit and deal with ventilation better. I couldn't believe how much better this full mask looked than everything else you could purchase at the usual retail stores, I was even asked where I rented the costume by my coworkers who thought my costume looked too good, I would highly recommend this mask for anyone looking for a far superior costume.
customer_reviews.author: Patric Hilker

customer_reviews.title: A great helmet! My 7 year-old son was the hit ...
customer_reviews.text: A great helmet! My 7 year-old son was the hit of Halloween, as he was the only one with a full helmet, and not a mask that only covers the front of the face. His head is on the larger size, so it fit fine. Just remember that it gets hot inside, so parents will end up carrying it while trick-or-treating!
customer_reviews.author: LuoLong

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is ok, several scratches all over. Doesn't appear to be used though. Also a little hard to see from the eye peices, they are pretty blurry. Looks great from the outside with a full costume. Added some padding inside for a tighter fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cable Treanor

customer_reviews.title: Fits from kids to adults
customer_reviews.text: All the adults at the house tried it on. It looks very nice. Two piece with Velcro so it fits a variety of head sizes. Eyes are blurry not the best material if planning to walk around in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: LAKCHMY

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well the helmet looked when I received it. The only cons I have with it are the eyes distort your vision and the lack of ventilation. Still a great prop for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Very authentic!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Darth Vader costume for my 9-year old son for Halloween, but he was so disappointed when we opened it only to find that the costume included only the front part of the mask. So I ordered this full mask for a more authentic Darth Vader look. Wow--what a difference! This full mask it in 2 parts held together by velcro. It seems pretty sturdy, and my son is very pleased. It fits my 9-year old without seeming too large for him, so I don't it will fit adults who have large heads. This full mask really makes the costume -- love it!
customer_reviews.author: MarlaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Know the power of the dark side!
customer_reviews.text: Completed my Halloween costume! Definitely worth the money and will make for a good decoration for the rest of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Milk

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The best helmet with an affordable price. The helmet is two pieces that snap together with velcro. The look is very authentic and looks perfect on an adult. My only concern was the lenses. They are made with a black see through plastic and makes the outside look blurry when looking through it. I used the helmet when there was still light outside so it wasn’t that bad but I can imagine at night it would be harder to see out of. Other than that this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Join the Dark Side
customer_reviews.text: Really great helmet. From the other reviews, I expected it to be near impossible to see out of, but it's actually not too bad. If course you wouldn't want to be using anything sharp, or be driving a car, but you can still see out of it. It's two parts, and it fits my husband pretty well. The only thing, is if you have a smaller head like I do (I had to try it!), the edges at the bottom might dig into your skin, so I would wear something to prevent discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: The hit of the night for me to show up to the kid's Halloween party as a convincing Darth Vader...it may or may not have been a lifelong dream of mine as well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Realistic look
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it is a full mask and fits well, But it is hard to see and not enough air passes through vents.(especially if you plan to go out at night with kids during Halloween) I wished they used the eye piece and vents form the the cheaper half mask that came with the costume I order (Rubie's Costume Star Wars Darth Vader Deluxe Adult Costume)
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Best mask looked very good, even up close. It fit a very large adult male head just fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wu

customer_reviews.title: fits my 5yr olds head with extra padding inside.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made, durable helmet by Rubies. Great for my son to troop in with us in our TK gear. Having a 4Ft tall Vader with a full helmet on is so fun and he has no complaints with it's fit. We padded it for him to wear, as I would do for any helmet I was going to be wearing for any length of time. if you have a large head, I don't know if this would fir you. There is a video on here of a girl putting it on, and that was extremely helpful to me in deciding to purchase this for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for my 55yr old mother and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my 55yr old mother and it fit her perfectly - me not so much but I have a big head and I didn't buy it for me so no complaints. The photo attached was for a "may the fourth" promo ad I did for a performing arts center I work for.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Everyone wants to be Darth!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this mask, fun to wear around the house. Not a great mask, but for the price it is what it is. Hard to see out of and not that comfortable for long periods of time. However, this sits in my office or theater room when not in use and looks pretty cool on the shelf as a prop or decoration that doubles as something the kids can wear. And for the price, I'm not worried about them wearing it/breaking it!
customer_reviews.author: Dragyn509

customer_reviews.title: The force is strong with this one
customer_reviews.text: SO much better than the little mask the suits come with. Worth every penny, only complaint is that it does fog up inside and becomes very hard to see out of in colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I have a 21 inch head across my forehead. Sits just a smidge big but works well w a low bun (how I plan on wearing it) as mentioned in previous reviews vision out of the eyes is a lil foggy but tolerable. You can see your eyes out of the lenses as well in bright light but not in the dark. I'm pleased w it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Y

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to be used as a "ha-ha" type of thing for an event. This is a full mask, so it will cover your entire head. The mask should fit an adult pretty well (I have a smaller head as a female, so it was a little big on me, but had a hair clip holding my hair up and it still fit fine). The top is attached with velcro. For a bucket, the visibility was better than I expected. Can't wait to see the smiles when we get to put it to use!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Welcome to the Dark Side.
customer_reviews.text: So, you know you have always wanted to be Darth Vader...and you know that the cheesy mask just won't work. This thing is very cool! It is a two piece helmet that covers your entire head. It does restrict your vision a bit but that is to be expected. I would not recommend this for kids walking around trick-or-treating but for grown up kids going to a party this is perfect. It fits together with velcro inside the helmet so is relatively easy on and off. Go ahead, you know you need one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Fogs up too easily and wobbles on the head and eyes pop out easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Darth halloween outfit. It looks quality, but the darn thing is too big for my head, the eyes fogged up, and one of the eyes even popped out on its own and lost it in the leaves as I was taking my kids trick or treating. I then lightly poked the other eye and it popped out too. If I had known that I would have glued them in place before I wore it.
customer_reviews.author: MTBDET

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but too large for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great full mask however, it was way too large for my head. I looked more like Darth Helmet instead of Darth Vador. Also the plastic for the eyes are really hard to see through. It's kind of blurry. I suspect if one is sensitive, it could give you headache after a while. I couldn't wear it long it enough to know for sure. Ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: stacylu5

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, hard to breathe and see.
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this for my sons Star Wars themed party looks amazing but very hard to breathe and see thru. I had to take breaks thru out the party just to breathe also the lenses kept fogging up.
customer_reviews.author: david burke

customer_reviews.title: mask is great
customer_reviews.text: its great darth is great in a time depression and fear .thank you for the fast sevrice
customer_reviews.author: antonia soltys

customer_reviews.title: If the mask fits... wear it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're an average sized person and looking for a mask to actually wear, then look no further. I've tried a lot of masks, and until a new one is designed that is not yet available, then this is the one to get. I highly recommend seeking a vendor that offers the tusks to add to the mask and you'll love the final look.
customer_reviews.author: Nondo

customer_reviews.title: Wish it fit with glasses better, but nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask.....hubby liked it and wore it for Halloween trick or treating!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: One Word ..........AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Got a 1/2 helmet with adult costume I bought, but wife/I decided I would look much better with a Full Face one. Found this one, liked what it looked like on Amazon, BUT when it came, both of us were totally shocked at how GREAT it looked. I put it on and, looked in the mirror and we were STUNNED at how it looked! In other words.......LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT!! Definitely a 5-Star item! Even for an "older" man (64), this helmet is GREAT!! What a totally cool addition to my Darth Vader costume!
customer_reviews.author: NavyVet

customer_reviews.title: This was great! I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This was great! I'm glad I bought it. The only drawbacks (minor) is that it's a bit difficult to see as the eyes slightly distorts your vision and the helmet fits a bit loose. I wore a thin knit cap under it and it worked perfectly. It came shipped in a box that protected it well and is great to store the helmet in. Great looking helmet and I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Really made my costume
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and the rubies deluxe women's Darth Vader costume, and while I was truly disappointed in the costumes construction, this was AWESOME!! Fits great, looks cool, and wasn't too hot. The only thing I did was add little foam pieces to the top over the eyes to rest the helmet a bit further back from my face so my eyes weren't right up against it. ( to hide them from being seen better)
customer_reviews.author: Kim G

customer_reviews.title: Fun for photo shoots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for an Imperial Physique photo shoot. It worked perfectly. Good quality for the money. We also have the storm trooper from this line and the Kylo ren black series. There's no comparison between this and the black series, but for less than 1/2 the price this is an awesome mask.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas Venazio

customer_reviews.title: Tell everyone to leave my Vader helmet alone!
customer_reviews.text: Helmet looks good, feels good, and goes great with my costume. Only problem is, everyone wants to wear it. Get your own helmet! This one's mine!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Fits well. You should get this
customer_reviews.text: This really is a good buy. Fit perfectly on my slightly larger than average male head. Had room to adjust if I needed to. It did get a bit warm in there. It temporary breaks from wearing it will solve that issue. I received many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: David Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Best price for a vader helmet
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a cheap helmet to use as a tree topper last Christmas. It is made out of plastic but well made. The feature of it coming into 2 pieces is great. It helps it fit on any size head. My 4 yr old can fit and and so can i. I have a large head and even got it on with a bun on my head.
customer_reviews.author: SamanthaRae

customer_reviews.title: Great Vader mask for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: It fit my "large" adult head just fine and my 5-year-old's as well, though she looks like Dark Helmet from Spaceballs with it. As noted in other reviews the lens aren't great. They remove and reinsert well but are distorted in shape, which makes the viewing a little trippy. There's not much visibility n the helmet, either, but that's the original design I'm sure. I recommend this helmet, especially for the price and fit.
customer_reviews.author: j.hatch

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: Was VERY pleasantly surprised at the quality of this mask. For under $35, it is the best mask you can buy. Full-head coverage, easy to put on and take off, the more I wore it, the easier it was to see, and looks great. Most people I saw on Halloween were surprised that this did not cost at least twice as much. I think I may order a second just to have a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Clarity of lenses unacceptable.
customer_reviews.text: Well-built and good quality overall but they really dropped the ball when it comes to the lenses which is probably the most vital component of any good mask. The clarity and distortion is just abysmal.
customer_reviews.author: cyclone

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear to a comicon. Unfortunately I bought it months in advance and when I finally took it from the box (too late to return) I noticed a crack in the back. If you buy it, I recommend you check it when it arrives. Visibility was okay but limited and it was hot as heck inside but it looked damn cool, and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: TROY A SNELL

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was pretty excited for this but we were kinda disappointed when we opened it & saw it came missing one of the eye parts. It was probably broken along the way of the delivery or something maybe it wasn’t the sellers fault. Other than that, it was everything we expected & he can’t wait to wear it. Eye glass or no eye glass
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect full face mask!
customer_reviews.text: Despite waiting for this forever (ordered as "Sold by Amazon," "in stock," and on Prime) we waited close to three weeks to have it delivered, my son LOVES this full face mask. He is five and thinks he is Darth Vader. The plastic is thick. The front face piece and back helmet part come apart to take on/off and they're held together by sturdy velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Greg & Kristen M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but lenses are blurry
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to get on and off but the lenses are very blurry I'll have to replace with some old sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: kurtdude

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the ridiculous stock photo
customer_reviews.text: Just in case you were thinking of not buying this because of the oddly surprised/dumb expression on Darth Vader's "face", please note that someone who obviously does not know who Darth Vader is was in charge of setting up this shot. This is a two piece helmet and they simply placed the top part of the helmet too far backward making the brow ridge look ridiculous. I got this for my son for Halloween and while it was a little hard to see through the eye pieces (not as clear as sunglasses even) and heated up a bit, it completely looked the part and his costume was awesome. Flat out. For the price THIS is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This was a great last-minute buy to up the ante on the cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great last-minute buy to up the ante on the cheap darth vader costume I purchased last minute for a party. It was a bit large but I bought some sponges and got it to fit well. There was a bit of unfinished plastic that scratched me above my eye when put the mask on and took it off, but maybe that added to the authenticity given Anakin's scar?
customer_reviews.author: AK77

customer_reviews.title: Great costume piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a great budget helmet for a kid or an adult. It is two pieces but I plan to modify it to look more like the movie. And this is pretty accurate and I recommend mainly for children because on an adult it looks like a shrimpy helmet on them and for the adults I would recommend the supreme helmet made from the ACTUAL MOLDS FROM EMPIRE STRIKES BACK!! And the reason I bought this is because of the samurai piece for an original Sith Lord costume for the episode 7 premiere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Darth Vader Mask for the Price
customer_reviews.text: It fit well despite having an above average head, and. for a $30 mask, looked quite convincing.
customer_reviews.author: NimitsTexan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mask for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Its great, wouldn't say its the best but you get what you pay for. If you're concerned about size let me ease your mind, it's huge. I have a huge head, so big I needed a special helmet for football and this mask fits snug on me. Nonetheless it still fits and the eyes fog up but that's expected. I love the fact the eyes is all black and no one can see your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for goofing around in or simple displays but not movie accurate
customer_reviews.text: For 30$ Its what I expected. I don't hate it and it was meant for display and no one will know the difference between this one and the screen accurate one. But having it next to my more expensive ones it looks a lil cheap for me. Still I won't return it... it's still a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Timbotron

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty much what you'd expect for the price. The fit isn't bad and with some padding or foam inside, it could be almost perfect. As mentioned in the other reviews, it can be a little tough to see out of. The Velcro that holds the helmet to the mask seems pretty secure and I'm happy with the purchase overall. I was skeptical upon ordering because the picture made it look a little goofy, however, it looks more true to the movies in person. If you have the time for modification, this could potentially be a great mask!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: For this being a "licensed item" it was poorly constructed. The velcro began to come off when adjusting the size or trying to put on. Very bulk and not easy to see in. Would not recommend for children or women.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect but I definately didn't want a half mask that came with the costume. The mask fit a little large and now I know why ol Darth moved his whole torso when he turned to look at someone but it does offer room to apply the sound effects device inside the front of the mask. Once you get used to the way it fits its fine. The only reason I didn't give all 5 stars is the inside of the mask, the eyes, fog up a little obscuring my vision.
customer_reviews.author: NAWebber

customer_reviews.title: You'd be surprised!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 50 year old Brother in law... He loved it! You'd be surprised how good it looks, how easy it comes on and off and how comfortable it is... So if your going to an event where everyone made their own Stormtrooper outfits then this just won't cut it BUT if your going to a Halloween party or just want to display it then it is by far worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for a great price. Only downside is the lenses in the eyes are really wavy and hard to see out of, but it’s mostly a display piece so I’m fine with that. Looks awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 11 year old son loves this full darth vader helmet!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves this full darth vader helmet! The only negative is the inside top of the helmet has some velcro and it was a little like and pulled his hair so I just cut off the extra and it's perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: Tweetie

customer_reviews.title: Bring a little Darth into your life!
customer_reviews.text: Friends of ours organized a Halloween-themed paddle for kayakers and stand-up paddlers. I already had a black dry suit and I thought hmmm, why not? It was a hit and I was able to wear it paddling. Now to design a voice encoder for that James Earl Jones sound...
customer_reviews.author: Circuit Hacker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Used for Halloween and it was perfect! The eyes are a little difficult to see out of at night because of the type of plastic they are made out of and they can fog up a bit, but overall not a huge issue and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Makenna Reinke

customer_reviews.title: I'm your father
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet. Will probably be better than what comes with the deluxe costume when I get it tomorrow. Is kinda big but we got some foam padding so I'm gonna put some inside the helmet for a better fit. The eye lenses are nice and dark but to where you can see them. The silver actually is silver plastic and not painted. Overall nice helmet. Quick shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it! He's 12 and a Hugh starwars fan.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is phenomenal. Most of the costumes only come with the face masks that leave the whole back side of your head exposed so we bought this one to use instead. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: LaKeisha

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet for the price
customer_reviews.text: Used along with darth vader outfit and disney $30 red lightsaber. Kids loved it and looked pretty realistic mainly because of the backside of helmet being included. Plastic is thin and would not withstand being crushed by something heavy but got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size, for a big head.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice helmet for the price. Definitely not 501st approved, but an excellent helmet. My head is larger than average. I am 6'3" and have a hat size of approximately 7 3/4 (62cm diameter). This fits snug, but not too snug. I would say that my head is the max size for this helmet. I am very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Junk, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is far too oversized. The eyes were so blurry that the helmet gave me and anyone else that wore it a headache within minutes of wearing it. I ended up having to pop the eyes out of the helmet just so I could wear something I paid (and wasted) almost $30 on. Absolute waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Great fit on an adult
customer_reviews.text: This mask was perfect after we ordered a Darth Vader costume and were disappointed by the half-mask that it came with. This mask fit my husband perfectly and left nothing showing. He said he had some trouble seeing out of it, but it worked for a quick appearance at our son's birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: missg27

product_meta.title: Star Wars Darth Vader Deluxe Adult Full Face Mask
product_meta.description: Harness the dark side of the Force and bring down the pesky rebels with this deluxe Darth Vader 2-piece helmet. Two-piece design with hook and loop (velcro-style) closure that connects the pieces during wear, with clear eye covers for visibility. One size; designed to fit most adults and older teens. Pair with others or coordinate the whole family in officially licensed Star Wars costumes by Rubie's for group dress up fun. Search for costumes, accessories, and décor items from Star Wars, The Empire Strikes Back, Return of the Jedi, The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, The Clone War, The Force Awakens, The Last Jedi, Rogue One, SOLO and more. Family-owned, family-focused and based in New York since 1951. As the world's largest designer and manufacturer of costumes Rubie's brings fun and fantasy to dress-up. Offering everything from full mascot suits to masks and wigs, from deluxe licensed costumes to simple starter pieces, from costume shoes to character make-up, and so much more. Rubie's promotes safety in dress-up, so you can relax and have a great time while looking the part. Look to Rubie's for every costume occasion and season: Halloween, Christmas, Mardi Gras, Easter, and all occasions in-between.
feature_bullets: Officially licensed Star Wars costume accessory, a trademark of Disney and Lucasfilm, look for trademark on packaging and labels to help assure you've received an authentic safety-tested item
Adult deluxe Darth Vader 2-piece helmet headpiece with clear eye covers for visibility during wear
One size; designed to fit most adults and older teens

Rubie’s offers costumes, accessories, and décor items from Star Wars, The Empire Strikes Back, Return of the Jedi, The Phantom Menace, Attack of the Clones, The Clone War, The Force Awakens, The Last Jedi, Rogue One, SOLO and more
Family-owned, family-focused, and based in the U.S.A. since 1951, Rubie’s has classic and licensed costumes and accessories in sizes and styles for your entire family
